channel.title: Pages on Bendit Chan

item.title: 關於我
item.description:
Hi! I am Bendit, Tsz Hin Chan (Chinese: 陳祉軒). I am from Hong Kong, currently a student of Mathematics in Imperial College London.

More about my course: Here.

Facts

  • I know $(4+\epsilon)$ languages: Cantonese, Mandarin, English, Korean and a little bit of French and Japanese.
  • I can play the piano and violin, but I listen to K-pop.
  • I enjoy puzzlehunts.
  • I like to produce music in my free time.
  • Eating and thinking about what to eat spans 70% of my time besides Mathematics.
  • I made some of the animations in The HoTT Game.
